hadiths.text: Jubair b. Mut'im reported on the authority of his father that he heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:I am Muhammad and I am Ahmad, and I am al-Mahi (the obliterator) by whom unbelief would be obliterated, and I am Hashir (the gatherer) at whose feet mankind will be gathered, and I am 'Aqib (the last to come) after whom there will be no Prophet

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي أَسْمَائِهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم .
